definitions.definition: A line or vector that is perpendicular to another line, surface, or plane .
A person who is healthy , normal, as opposed to one who is morbid .
A person who is normal, who fits into mainstream society, as opposed to those who live alternative lifestyles .

examples: His workload is now back to normal .
Heavy workload is the new normal .

main_definition: ( geometry , countable ) A line or vector that is perpendicular to another line, surface, or plane .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine , countable ) A person who is healthy , normal, as opposed to one who is morbid .
( slang , countable ) A person who is normal, who fits into mainstream society, as opposed to those who live alternative lifestyles .
